titleStmt.title: The wonder of the world being a perfect relation of a young maid, about eighteen years of age, which hath not tasted of any food this two and fifty weeks ... : wherein is related the whole truth and no more, as it was taken from the mouth of the damsel and her mother, being a true account of her condition / written by Thomas Robins ...
titleStmt.author: Robins, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
